metadata.title: USN-4868-1 -- LibTomCrypt vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that LibTomCrypt incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or read sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4868-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libtomcrypt-dev - 1.17-5ubuntu0.1+esm1 libtomcrypt0 - 1.17-5ubuntu0.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
